definition.name: AWS Lambda Deploy Action
definition.description: Updates the code and configuration of AWS Lambda functions. If the function does not exist, a new one will be created.
definition.author: aws-actions

inputs.name: function-name
inputs.description: Name of the Lambda function.

inputs.name: package-type
inputs.description: The package type of the Lambda function. Set to "Image" for container image functions, defaults to "Zip" for .zip file functions.

inputs.name: image-uri
inputs.description: The URI of the container image in Amazon ECR. Required when package-type is "Image".

inputs.name: code-artifacts-dir
inputs.description: The path to a directory of code artifacts to zip and deploy to Lambda. Required when package-type is "Zip".

inputs.name: handler
inputs.description: The name of the method within your code that Lambda calls to run your function. Required when package-type is "Zip".

inputs.name: runtime
inputs.description: The identifier of the runtime. Required when package-type is "Zip".

inputs.name: s3-bucket
inputs.description: S3 bucket name to use for Lambda deployment package. If provided, S3 deployment method will be used instead of direct upload.

inputs.name: s3-key
inputs.description: S3 key for the Lambda deployment package in the bucket. If not provided, a key will be auto-generated using the format: lambda-deployments/{function-name}/{timestamp}-{commit-hash}.zip.

inputs.name: publish
inputs.description: Set to true to publish a new version of the function after updating the code.

inputs.name: dry-run
inputs.description: Set true to validate the request parameters and access permissions without modifying the function code. Applicable for updating function code only. Creating and updating function configuration will be skipped since they do not support dry run.

inputs.name: revision-id
inputs.description: Update the function only if the revision ID matches the ID that is specified.

inputs.name: architectures
inputs.description: The instruction set architecture that the function supports.

inputs.name: source-kms-key-arn
inputs.description: The ARN of the Key Management Service (KMS) customer managed key that is used to encrypt your functions .zip deployment package.

inputs.name: role
inputs.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the functions execution role. Required when creating a new function.

inputs.name: function-description
inputs.description: A description of the function.

inputs.name: memory-size
inputs.description: The amount of memory available to the function at runtime.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: The amount of time (in seconds) that Lambda allows a function to run before stopping it.

inputs.name: vpc-config
inputs.description: For network connectivity to Amazon Web Services resources in a VPC, specify a list of security groups and subnets in the VPC.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.description: Environment variables as a JSON string

inputs.name: dead-letter-config
inputs.description: Specifies the queue or topic where Lambda sends asynchronous events when they fail processing.

inputs.name: kms-key-arn
inputs.description: The ARN of the Key Management Service (KMS) customer managed key

inputs.name: tracing-config
inputs.description: Set Mode to Active to sample and trace a subset of incoming requests with X-Ray.

inputs.name: layers
inputs.description: A list of function layers to add to the functions execution environment.

inputs.name: file-system-configs
inputs.description: Connection settings for an Amazon EFS file system.

inputs.name: image-config
inputs.description: Configuration for the Lambda functions container image.

inputs.name: ephemeral-storage
inputs.description: The size of the functions /tmp directory in MB. The default value is 512, but can be any whole number between 512 and 10,240 MB.

inputs.name: snap-start
inputs.description: The functions SnapStart setting.

inputs.name: logging-config
inputs.description: The Amazon CloudWatch Logs configuration settings for the function.

inputs.name: code-signing-config-arn
inputs.description: The ARN of a code-signing configuration to use on this function.

inputs.name: tags
inputs.description: Tags to apply to the function as a JSON string (e.g. {"Environment":"Production","Team":"DevOps"})

outputs.name: function-arn
outputs.description: The ARN of the updated Lambda function.

outputs.name: version
outputs.description: The function version if a new version was published.
